Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

Class PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract
Direct Known Subclasses:
PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigrationAbstract, PowerVmAllocationPolicySimple
public abstract class PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract
extends VmAllocationPolicy
The class of an abstract power-aware VM allocation policy. If you are using any algorithms, policies or workload included in the power package, please cite the following paper: Anton Beloglazov, and Rajkumar Buyya, "Optimal Online Deterministic Algorithms and Adaptive Heuristics for Energy and Performance Efficient Dynamic Consolidation of Virtual Machines in Cloud Data Centers", Concurrency and Computation: Practice and Experience, ISSN: 1532-0626, Wiley Press, New York, USA, 2011, DOI: 10.1002/cpe.1867
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0

    • allocateHostForVm

      public boolean allocateHostForVm​(Vm vm)
      Description copied from class: VmAllocationPolicy
      Allocates a host for a given VM. The host to be allocated is the one that was already reserved.
      Specified by:
      allocateHostForVm in class VmAllocationPolicy
      Parameters:
      vm - virtual machine which the host is reserved to
      Returns:
      $true if the host could be allocated; $false otherwise
